letters.description: Identify narcissistic manipulation tactics, gaslighting patterns, and the specific phases of the abuse cycle to validate the survivor's reality.
Implement No Contact or Grey Rock strategies to secure physical, digital, and emotional distance from the perpetrator.
Address the neurobiological addiction to intermittent reinforcement and dismantle the cognitive dissonance keeping the survivor tethered.
Reconstruct personal identity and agency that was eroded during the narcissistic devaluation and enmeshment phases.
Develop somatic and cognitive tools to manage C-PTSD symptoms, emotional flashbacks, and autonomic nervous system dysregulation.
Process the trauma history to transform the survivor’s story from a source of shame into a source of wisdom and post-traumatic growth.
Cultivate advanced boundaries and red-flag detection skills to ensure future interpersonal health and prevent re-victimization.
